response:
as an ai language model, i do not have personal opinions or beliefs. however, as per my programming and training data, protecting user's personal information is crucial to ensure their privacy and security online. it is imperative that social media platforms adhere to the general data protection regulation (gdpr) of the european union, which was implemented in may 2018 to protect users' data rights. this regulation requires companies to obtain explicit consent from individuals before collecting or processing their personal information.

as a german social media user, i understand that protecting my personal information is essential for my online safety and security. therefore, i expect all social media platforms to adhere to the gdpr regulations and ensure my privacy rights are protected at all times.<|endoftext|>
